description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, implementing a simple health check interface that contacts a backend service via HealthService and displays connectivity status.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: A stateless widget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget serving as the main page with a title and health check logic.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI state, performing an asynchronous backend health check and updating UI based on connectivity status.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: _startHealthCheck
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous check to backend health via HealthService and updates UI state with the result.
